Package com.github.rwitzel.streamflyer.regex

This package contains the classes that are needed to apply regular expressions on character streams.

See: Description

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    MatchProcessor
    This interface is used by RegexModifier.
    OnStreamMatcher
    A reduced variant of a Matcher.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AbstractMatchProcessor
    Helps to return a MatchProcessorResult that cannot cause an endless loop.
    MatchProcessorResult
    Result of MatchProcessor.process(StringBuilder, int, java.util.regex.MatchResult) .
    OnStreamStandardMatcher
    Implements OnStreamMatcher using any JDK > 5.0.
    RegexModifier
    Finds text that matches a given regular expression.
    ReplacingProcessor
    This MatchProcessor replaces the matching text (given by the MatchResult) with the configured replacement.

Package com.github.rwitzel.streamflyer.regex Description

This package contains the classes that are needed to apply regular expressions on character streams. The pivotal class is RegexModifier.
